name: Home (itch) (GodTheKid)
description:
GodTheKid's submission for the Ludwig Jam

Controls:

  •  Click and drag mouse to launch ship into the direction it faces
  •  Press R to reset the level
  •  Press SPACEBAR to show Pause Menu

Info:

  • All the planets have gravity that scales with their size.
  • Some Planets have an orange field. If you remain in the orange field for more than a second without colliding you will anchor to the field and orbit the planet.
  •  If you collide with a planet, you will be knocked back.
  • There is a constant force pulling you to the center of the map.
  • The goal of the game is to make it home (planet with green aura)
